This is the only Series 1 coin that has a Series 2 hologram!!*All coins loaded with face valueSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 24th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1, 2, each @ 0.0022Lot 3, 4, 5, each @ 0.0032Where the matte and the shiny finish seperate releases or did any other seperation happen (by consecutive serial numbers or something like that?).Do they come with vertificate?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: February 20, 2023, 01:13:19 PMLast edit: February 21, 2023, 12:07:14 PM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on February 20, 2023, 01:07:11 PMLot 1, 2, each @ 0.0022Lot 3, 4, 5, each @ 0.0032Where the matte and the shiny finish seperate releases or did any other seperation happen (by consecutive serial numbers or something like that?).Do they come with vertificate?Yes, from what I remember they came out at different times.And I think so.. the numbering was continued per series.. but I think he added an "A" to the beginning of the numberings when the Vreneli came out.Lot 3 and Lot 5 come with COA. Pretty sure the 1st series coins came without COAs

comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on February 20, 2023, 01:13:19 PMPretty sure the 1st series coins came without COAsCorrect, just the coins, as it was Frank's very first release - also some shipping/packing issues that accidentally peeled some in transit as I recall too.... @Hookzup1 ? Lot 1 - 0.0025Lot 2 - 0.0025Lot 3 - 0.0037Lot 4 - 0.0037
